name: Through the Vault
description:
Free all of the Wardens in a level to open the gateway. A Warden will move towards you if they have a direct line of sight.

A game for the Brackeys 2021.2 jam, for the theme "Let There Be Chaos".

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - move
R - Restart Level
M - Mute Music
N - Mute Sound Effects
ESC - Quit

Credits

The game was created in its entirety by Andrew Stevenson.

Music

Music: Dark Hollows by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
